title: 2 problems here :(
body:
Firstly, I have an error saying that the http server wont let me on or something like that.
Secondly, I didn't get my mystery gift, i was never banned or restricted before :(, did i get reported or was I just left out :(.

(EDIT: Now working again, but still no gift, apparently they are being given out in waves.)

replies.body: Other people are also getting this issue, though it's only been of recent. Try scouring the boards a bit more, and keep tabs on the other threads. A solution should come about eventually.
Thanks, its working now, idk what happened.

Did you do anything? Like test it out with something?

Or did it just start working without you doing anything?
